title: Primož Roglič Carries Red Bull into Audacious Giro-Tour Double: ‘Pogačar Proved it’s Possible’
content:
Roglič rides into Giro d'Italia with Pogačar as a reference and the pressure to paper over Bora-Bull's miserable spring: ‘He can totally turn around our season.’

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Carries Red Bull into Audacious Giro-Tour Double: ‘Pogačar Proved it’s Possible’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
